v1.headline: Join my personal branding academy ↓ Click the "Visit my website" button to learn the Copy Creator method and get 6 courses for the price of 1. Prices will rise later this year. CEO at Copyblogger. ✞
v1.about:
Results I've delivered to my clients and customers:

1. Freelancer - Went from 0 to $20k/mo in 5 months.
2. Agency Owner - Got 7 clients in our first 6 weeks.
3. Coach - Went from having 2 clients to 8 in 3 months.
4. Course Seller - 196% sales increase in 3 months.
5. SaaS CEO - Acquired 50+ paid users per month.
6. Founder - Sold his startup to a PE firm for $10m.
7. Thought Leader - Got 72,000 followers in 9 months.

I've also helped thousands of professionals get jobs, connections, and more.

Having a strong personal brand, great content, and persuasive copywriting is a cheat code, and I know exactly how to get all of them for any kind of creator.

Here's how you can do the same:

1. Join Copyblogger Academy. It gives you 6 courses, ongoing education, expert Q&A, and a lot more for just $197. Hit the link in my featured section to join before prices rise.

2. Get hands-on help with your personal branding strategy and direct growth assistance in my higher-priced group, Content & Clients. DM me "C&C" to explore this option.

I can't wait to work with you.
